title: Command Syntax
content:
Quoting

echo Hello World
echo "Hello World"
echo 'No $expansion here'
echo "But $HOME expands"

Exit codes

Commands return an exit status: 0 = success, non-zero = error/special condition. The last status is in $?.

ls /nope
echo $?
ls /
echo $?

Chaining

mkdir -p sandbox && cd sandbox
cd /nope || echo "cd failed"
